problems.description: People struggle to find meaning and clarity in a world full of distractions and superficial goals.
Many lack actionable systems to convert life purpose into daily action.

missions.description: Help myself and others find clarity and meaning by defining and aligning with personal Telos.
Develop and share tools for continuous self-improvement and value-driven living.

goals.description: Write a personal Telos statement and revisit it weekly.
Create a blog series and toolkit for practical Telos application.

strategies.description: Block 15 minutes every Sunday to reflect and revise Telos statement.
Outline blog topics, draft weekly, and share drafts for peer review.

notes: Telos work feels most valuable when connected to real daily action.
Consider sharing progress publicly for accountability.
